name: Space Log Demo
description:
Accepting all recruits from all sectors of the galaxy, no experience needed! Come aboard Daymo Station for hands-on training from the finest Space Log engineers! After a 15-20 minute training session you can claim your Space Log certification and begin your career!

A demo for SGC 2021. 
Please leave your thoughts, suggestions, questions and concerns in the comments below, I'd love to hear from you!

This game is my attempt to bring some of the fun and unique gameplay that exists in modded Minecraft to more people. 

You can follow the continued development of the game at https://twitter.com/yimmit303
